amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to enforce a Department of Treasury regulation that changed rules related to trade with Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to administer, implement, or enforce the amendment made in section 515.533 of title 31, Code of Federal Regulations, that was published in the Federal Register on Feb. 25, 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (KS) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Moran (KS).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran (KS) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
